pages.title: Upgrading Your Heaters
pages.text: As the cold intensifies, basic heaters won't cut it. Surround a Thermal Heater with materials to create upgraded versions with greater heat output, range, and fuel efficiency.$(br2)$(l:heating/thermal_heater)Base Heater$(/l): +35°C, 7-block radius$(br)$(li)Iron: +50°C, 9-block radius, 1.5x fuel$(br)$(li)Gold: +65°C, 11-block radius, 2x fuel$(br)$(li)Diamond: +80°C, 14-block radius, 3x fuel

pages.title: Iron Thermal Heater
pages.text: Surround a Thermal Heater with 8 iron ingots. A solid upgrade for Phase 3-4.

pages.title: Gold Thermal Heater
pages.text: Surround a Thermal Heater with 8 gold ingots. Extended range helps cover larger bases.

pages.title: Diamond Thermal Heater
pages.text: Surround a Thermal Heater with 8 diamonds. The strongest fuel-based heater — triple burn time and massive range.
